description.english: Wear a matching outfit including hat, desk, desk decoration, keyboard and mouse
description.german: Trage ein passendes Outfit inklusive Hut, Schreibtisch, Schreibtischdeko, Tastatur und Maus
description.french: Portez un ensemble assorti incluant chapeau, bureau, décoration de bureau, clavier et souris
description.italian: Indossa un outfit coordinato includendo cappello, scrivania, decorazioni della scrivania, tastiera e mouse
description.koreana: 모자, 책상, 책상 장식, 키보드, 마우스를 포함한 세트 착용
description.spanish: Lleva un conjunto a juego incluyendo sombrero, escritorio, decoración de escritorio, teclado y ratón
description.schinese: 穿戴一套包括帽子、桌子、桌面装饰、键盘和鼠标的套装
description.tchinese: 穿戴完整套裝，包括帽子、桌子、桌面裝飾、鍵盤與滑鼠
description.russian: Наденьте подходящий комплект одежды, включая шляпу, стол, декор стола, клавиатуру и мышь
description.thai: สวมชุดเข้าชุดรวมถึงหมวก โต๊ะ ของตกแต่งโต๊ะ แป้นพิมพ์ และเมาส์
description.japanese: 帽子、机、机の装飾、キーボード、マウスを含むお揃いの衣装を着る
description.polish: Załóż dopasowany strój włączając kapelusz, biurko, dekoracje biurka, klawiaturę i mysz
description.turkish: Şapka, masa, masa dekorasyonu, klavye ve fare dahil uyumlu bir kıyafet giy
description.brazilian: Use um conjunto combinando incluindo chapéu, mesa, decoração da mesa, teclado e mouse
description.vietnamese: Mặc một bộ trang phục đồng bộ gồm mũ, bàn, đồ trang trí bàn, bàn phím và chuột
